remarks: Lemma for ~ lclkr .  Eliminate by cases the hypotheses of ~ lclkrlem2u , ~ lclkrlem2u and ~ lclkrlem2w .  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lclkrlem2x.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lclkrlem2x.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lclkrlem2x.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lclkrlem2x.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lclkrlem2x.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lclkrlem2x.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lclkrlem2x.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lclkrlem2x.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` D ) $.
lclkrlem2x.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lclkrlem2x.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lclkrlem2x.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lclkrlem2x.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. F ) $.
lclkrlem2x.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lclkrlem2x.le $e |- ( ph -> ( L ` E ) = ( ._|_ ` { X } ) ) $.
lclkrlem2x.lg $e |- ( ph -> ( L ` G ) = ( ._|_ ` { Y } ) ) $.
lclkrlem2x $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` ( E .+ G ) ) ) ) = ( L ` ( E .+ G ) ) ) $.
